TEXT.TITLE: INTREPID MUSEUM CONTINUES REORGANIZATION TALKS
TEXT.BODY: The Intrepid Museum Foundation reiterated that it is continuing negotiations with its official Bondholders' and creditors' committees concerning the terms of a Chapter 11 plan of reorganization. In December 1986, the museuem said it proposed a 20 pct cash payment to its bondholders and a 12.5 pct cash payment to the unsecured creditors. The museum said it is hopeful of filing a plan in the near future. The museum said it has 15.2 mln dlrs principal amount of gross revenue bonds outstanding, and approximately 1,350,000 of unsecured debt. Reuter
